Class TransportLayerSender

java.lang.Object
  irProtocol.TransportLayerSender

public class TransportLayerSender
extends java.lang.Object

Transport Layer - Sender Will send the data and retransmit if an acknowledgement haven't been received in a calculated time.

Nicolai Sonne
